name: Eye'm coming
description:
Windows highly recommended. Made in 14 days for the LOWREZJAM 2021. 
This game is not really scary, but might be classified as horror.

A test in the lab of the army base went horribly wrong, move your way trough the base and defeat all monsters that get in your way.

-CONTROLS-

WASD to move
Mouse to look around
Left mouse button to shoot
R to reload
SHIFT to run
Spacebar to jump

-CREDITS-

Code & design: Jael137 (jael137.itch.io)
Music: SleepyUFO (https://soundcloud.com/johnny-yang-365546710)
Animation: S.
Some 3d models are from turbosquid: Science equipment, Spotlight, 3dLighting, Street light. Some other models and textures are from poly haven.
All other models and textures are made by jael137 with blender
Some soundeffects are from: freesound. All other sound effects are made by jael137and mixed with audacity.
